about_the_game:
Are you ready to become a rabbit breeder mad with love?


Collect and breed over 1000 cute bunnies and watch them live their life with adorable (or sometimes sexy/nsfw) animations.
Merge different types of bunnies to create new species, but also train them in order to compete in various events and contests.
Mate a cute blue and a yellow rabbit to create an adorable green baby rabbit.
Some features have been created with humor in mind, so have a good laugh!



Train your favorite bunnies in mini-games:

There are also several very cool mini-games where you can train your cute rabbits and win exclusive prizes.



Find all Legendaries and collect them!

They're legendary, sometimes have game-changing powers, and they're just SO MUCH CUTER



Be careful with foxes and owls...

They're just waiting to eat your rabbits... One moment of inattention and they eat one of your favorite rabbits!



Decorate your mill:

Create and personalize your adorable farm mill to welcome your legendary rabbits! The joys of interior decoration are yours and we have plenty of design pieces that are just super cute. Unlock all decoration items like:
● Decorative objects
● Wallpaper
● Original floors
● And more!



3 modes to play the way you want:
● Safe mode : no NSFW, just bunnies hugging each other.
● Adult mode : You can't see behind the blur!
● Uncensored mode : NSFW content and some blood during foxes and owls attacks.

content_descriptors.notes:
When you activate "adult" mode, the little bunnies mate while playing funny little animations based on Kamasutra positions that can be unlocked while playing.
Nothing vulgar, it's humor.

name: Bunniiies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: These rabbits are crazy, they can't stop hugging each other! The only solution is to run this farm! Will you be a super breeder of love-crazed rabbits?
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Hindi
